ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ply1scl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ply1scl.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 3 |  | coe1scl.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | coe1scl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( var1 ` R ) = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` P ) = ( .s ` P ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` P ) = ( mulGrp ` P ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 1, 5, 6, 7, 8, 2 | #P_ply1scltm | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K ) -> ( A ` X ) = ( X ( .s ` P ) ( 0 ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) ( var1 ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K ) -> ( coe1 ` ( A ` X ) ) = ( coe1 ` ( X ( .s ` P ) ( 0 ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) ( var1 ` R ) ) ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_0nn0 | |- 0 e. NN0 |
| 12 | 4, 3, 1, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_coe1tm | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K /\ 0 e. NN0 ) -> ( coe1 ` ( X ( .s ` P ) ( 0 ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) ( var1 ` R ) ) ) ) = ( x e. NN0 |-> if ( x = 0 , X , .0. ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mp3an3 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K ) -> ( coe1 ` ( X ( .s ` P ) ( 0 ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` P ) ) ( var1 ` R ) ) ) ) = ( x e. NN0 |-> if ( x = 0 , X , .0. ) ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K ) -> ( coe1 ` ( A ` X ) ) = ( x e. NN0 |-> if ( x = 0 , X , .0. ) ) ) |
